name: A Free 2 Hand
description:
This project is for the My First GameJam Summer 2021. A Free to Hand is a Platformer game, where free hand drawings and movements are keys to escape for freedom with this platformer challenge.

IMPORTANT NOTE: *After you run the game, make sure you hit the Blue Arrows on the corner right of the game screen to get the right size for the screen*

Main Controls:

A and D to move

W to Jump

Left click to Draw

Right Click to Erase earlier draws.

R to restart 

ESC to pause

Any feedback or suggestions for this game is appreciated.
